abstract: Frustrations simmer anew as NBA owners and players move to the precipice of a deal and then squander the moment; commissioner David Stern cancels the rest of the November schedule and declares that an 82-game season is now irretrievably out of reach.
snippet: Commissioner David Stern canceled all games through Nov. 30, despite substantial progress made in several areas this week.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner David Stern canceled all games through Nov. 30, despite substantial progress made in several areas this week.

headline.main: N.B.A. Talks Stall and More Games Are Canceled
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Talks Stall, and More Games Are Canceled
headline.seo: N.B.A. Talks Stall and Games Are Canceled Through November
